info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 3:34AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Elkhart, northwestern Noble, western Lagrange and south central St. Joseph Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 333 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunlap, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elkhart, Goshen, Nappanee, Dunlap, Middlebury, Bristol, Topeka, Millersburg, New Paris, Benton, Scott, Shipshewana, Honeyville, Klinger Lake, Southwest, Foraker, Waterford Mills and Emma. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 95 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
